name: Portuguese for Kids
description: Portuguese for Kids is a free educational application to learn basic Portuguese words in a fun way.  Categories of Portuguese for Kids -Animals -Numbers -Fruits -Vegetables -Colors -Transport -Countries -Occupations -School Objects -Verbs -Sports -Music Instruments -Clothes -Foods -Kitchen -Bathroom    Parts of Portuguese for Kids Learning: A random Portuguese word from the selected category is displayed with it s picture and pronunciation Game 1: One random picture from the selected category is displayed and you are asked to select the correct Portuguese word from the options. Game 2: One random Portuguese word from the selected category is displayed and you are asked to select the correct picture from the options.
